issue.title: Add Map type as reader / writer in FieldReader / FieldWriter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11173](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11173). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Based on the [discussion on the mailing list](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/r98323d8f28c6d3a5304cdaf1900797cf89e6b15096dc7a09a48003e7%40%3Cuser.arrow.apache.org%3E), I'm opening this story to add Map as a top-level feature in the vector reader and writers.
